tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictResolution (
    mediator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    arbitrator_id INT,
    conflict_type VARCHAR(50),
    conflict_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_mediators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(255),
  conflicts_flagged BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_arbitrators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255),
  conflicts_flagged BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_cases (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  mediator_id INT,
  arbitrator_id INT,
  case_opened BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Resolutions (
  conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mediator_id INT,
  arbitrator_id INT,
  conflict_date DATE,
  conflict_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Mediators (
  mediator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  expertise_area VARCHAR(100),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Arbitrators (
  arbitrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  arbitrator_name VARCHAR(50),
  cases_handled INT,
  specialization VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conflict_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Resolution_Log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conflict_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_details TEXT
)
